Title: OhZee Creative Controls
Description: Includes several XAML controls for Silverlight and Windows 8.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Includes several XAML controls for Silverlight and Windows 8.

OhZee Creative Controls contains several XAML controls for Silverlight and Windows 8. Included are:
  • RadialControl
  • RadialIndicator
  • RadialLayoutPanel
  • RadialRepeater
  • EvenLayoutPanel
  • Checkers
  • Starburst
  • Sunburst

Install via NuGet: http://www.nuget.org/packages/OzControls/


NOTE: Use at your own risk. This project may or may not be updated.
